KeyHelp.Body1: Ctrl+A Select all text Ctrl+C Copy Ctrl+Shift+D Insert date (all views) Ctrl+K Compose characters Ctrl+S Save/Accept Ctrl+W delete word back Ctrl+V Paste Ctrl+Shift+V Paste from list Ctrl+W Delete word back Ctrl+X Cut Ctrl+Z Undo
Ctrl+F Find Ctrl+G Find again Ctrl+Shift+G Find previous again Ctrl+R Replace Ctrl+Shift+R Replace again

Ctrl+Shift+F ifFalse: Alt+G := (Windows and X11) Ctrl+; := (OSX and X11) Ctrl+Shift+T ifTrue:
Ctrl+D Do It Ctrl+E Explain Ctrl+P Print It Ctrl+Q Inspect It Ctrl+B Debug It
Ctrl+S Save/Accept Ctrl+Y User interrupt Ctrl+\ Process interrupt
